PHRASE.LANG: Easter Bunny and Egg Mega Bundle
Méga lot lapin et œuf de Pâques
Mega Set Coniglio e Uovo di Pasqua
Mega Pack Conejo y Huevo de Pascua

Be sure to have everything you need for this Easter with the Easter Bunny and Egg Mega Bundle.
 
 These locomotion objects will boost your speed.
 
 Speed:
 ・Standard = 5.25m/s
 
 This bundle contains:
 (1) Animal Avatar - Easter Rabbit - Black
 (2) Animal Avatar - Easter Rabbit - Blue
 (3) Animal Avatar - Easter Rabbit - Chocolate
 (4) Animal Avatar - Easter Rabbit - Tortoiseshell
 (5) Animal Avatar - Easter Rabbit - Steel
 (6) Animal Avatar - Easter Rabbit - White
 (7) Rolling Giant Egg - Blue
 (8) Rolling Giant Egg - Purple
 (9) Rolling Giant Egg - Green 
 
 ※These items are portable items. [#Legal]
